SEARCH
Package com.dhk.io

Class SetDisplay

java.lang.Object
com.dhk.io.SetDisplay
public class SetDisplay extends Object
Utilizes the SetDisplay JNI library to immediately apply the given display mode, scaling mode, DPI scale percentage, and orientation mode for the given display.
Author:
Jonathan Miller
License:
The MIT License

  • Method Details

    • applyDisplaySettings

      public void applyDisplaySettings(String displayId, int resWidth, int resHeight, int bitDepth, int refreshRate, int scalingMode, int dpiScalePercentage)
      Immediately applies the given settings for the given display.
      Parameters:
      displayId - - The ID of the display to apply the display settings for
      resWidth - - The new horizontal resolution for the given display
      resHeight - - The new vertical resolution for the given display
      bitDepth - - The new bit depth for the given display
      refreshRate - - The new refresh rate for the given display
      scalingMode - - The new scaling mode for the given display
      dpiScalePercentage - - The new DPI scale percentage for the given display

    • applyDisplayOrientation

      public void applyDisplayOrientation(String displayId, int orientationMode)
      Immediately applies the given orientation mode for the given display.
      Parameters:
      displayId - - The ID of the display to apply the orientation mode for
      orientationMode - - The new orientation mode for the given display. 0 for Landscape, 1 for Portrait, 2 for Inverted Landscape, and 3 for Inverted Portrait
